item.title: Fabvl - Fortnite Rap Song
item.description:
Fortnite Rap Song - Go (Season 10 Battle Royale) by FabvL. Itâ€™s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Video source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nlBIXaevobI Chords Used: Am F E7
The boomwhacker / handbell version of this playalong may be found here: https://youtu.be/sc9TvnD2pfM .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Toby Turner & Tobuscus - I Can Swing My Sword! - Key of Dm
item.description:
I Can Swing My Sword! (Minecraft Song) by Toby Turner. Itâ€™s been lowered by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: Dm F A
To see the Tobuscus animation video click here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eN7dYDYfvVg .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Tetris Theme Ukulele Play Along - Key of Am
item.description:
For educational use. Â Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Â Key of Am.
Chords Used: Am, E7, Dm, C
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/s6PlqSZkZic
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Magalovania Undertale Ukulele Play Along--Slow Version - Key of F
item.description: For Educational Use. The tempo of this song is slower than the original. Please look for a ukulele play along with a video to the original tempo. G, B flat, D flat, C, F flat, Dm, and F.
